headline: Costco Lawsuit Puts Rotisserie Chicken And Food Safety Story Under Review
summary: Costco Wholesale (NasdaqGS:COST) faces a proposed class action lawsuit tied to alleged salmonella contamination at its Nebraska chicken processing plant. The complaint targets Costco's rotisserie chicken supply chain and claims the company did not adequately control or disclose salmonella risks. The case focuses on a core product that draws frequent member traffic, raising questions about food safety procedures and disclosure practices. Costco operates a membership based warehouse retail...

headline: Forget AI—Tax Refunds Could Give Retail Stocks a Lift

headline: Costco quietly reverses decades-old deli rule
summary: Regular Costco shoppers will know that, on top of the regular wholesale groceries and a food court famous for its large slices of pizza and $1.50 hot-dog-and-soda combo, the big-box chain also offers an extensive selection of cakes and deli trays. Its bakeries in particular have been a core store ...

headline: How Recent Analyst Moves Are Shaping The Costco Wholesale (COST) Valuation Story
summary: Why Costco’s Fair Value Estimate Just Got a Small Upgrade Costco Wholesale’s fair value estimate has been adjusted slightly higher to about US$1,047.90 from roughly US$1,030.19, reflecting updated assumptions around how its membership model could hold up as consumer habits shift. Recent Street commentary links this change to fresh price target moves that tie Costco’s membership fees and warehouse format to earnings quality through mixed spending patterns and food disinflation, while still...
